

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(tsibble)
library(lubridate)
library(ggiraph)
theme_set(theme_minimal())
```


```{r, include=FALSE}  
air_q_url <-
  'data/e1cc82ec-97bb-463c-a3fb-b61be60f0956.csv'

air_q <- 
  air_q_url %>% 
  readr::read_csv() %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  rename(date = data)

air_q_o3 <- 
  air_q %>% 
  filter(inquinante == 'O3') %>% 
  mutate(date = date %>% as_date)

```

```{r}
ozone_limits <- 120
limits_colour <- 'red'

p1 <- 
  air_q_o3 %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = date,
      y = valore,
      tooltip = glue::glue('Data: {date}\nValore: {valore}')
    )
  ) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0) +
  # geom_vline(xintercept = 0) +
  geom_segment(data = . %>% 
                 filter(valore > ozone_limits),
               mapping = aes(xend = date,
                             yend = ozone_limits),
               colour = limits_colour,
               size = .2) +
  geom_point_interactive(size = 1) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = ozone_limits,
             colour = limits_colour) 

girafe(
  ggobj = p1,
  height_svg = 3,
  pointsize = 10,
  options = list(
    opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1)
  ))
```
